Uses of Class
com.madrobot.io.file.monitor.FileDeleteStrategy

  • Packages that use FileDeleteStrategy 
    Package Description
    com.madrobot.io.file.monitor
    File monitoring tools

    • Uses of FileDeleteStrategy in com.madrobot.io.file.monitor

      Fields in com.madrobot.io.file.monitor declared as FileDeleteStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FileDeleteStrategy FileDeleteStrategy.FORCE
      The singleton instance for forced file deletion, which always deletes, even if the file represents a non-empty directory.
      static FileDeleteStrategy FileDeleteStrategy.NORMAL
      The singleton instance for normal file deletion, which does not permit the deletion of directories that are not empty.
      Methods in com.madrobot.io.file.monitor with parameters of type FileDeleteStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FileCleaningTracker.track(File file, Object marker, FileDeleteStrategy deleteStrategy)
      Track the specified file, using the provided marker, deleting the file when the marker instance is garbage collected.
      void FileCleaningTracker.track(String path, Object marker, FileDeleteStrategy deleteStrategy)
      Track the specified file, using the provided marker, deleting the file when the marker instance is garbage collected.
